description: DC side of the current source converter (CSC).

contents.name: alpha
contents.description: Firing angle, typical value between 10 and 18 degrees for a rectifier. CSC state variable, result from power flow.

contents.name: gamma
contents.description: Extinction angle. CSC state variable, result from power flow.

contents.name: maxAlpha
contents.description: Maximum firing angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow.

contents.name: maxGamma
contents.description: Maximum extinction angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow.

contents.name: maxIdc
contents.description: The maximum direct current (Id) on the DC side at which the converter should operate. Converter configuration data use in power flow.

contents.name: minAlpha
contents.description: Minimum firing angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow.

contents.name: minGamma
contents.description: Minimum extinction angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow.

contents.name: minIdc
contents.description: The minimum direct current (Id) on the DC side at which the converter should operate. CSC configuration data used in power flow.

contents.name: operatingMode
contents.description: Indicates whether the DC pole is operating as an inverter or as a rectifier. CSC control variable used in power flow.

enumValues.name: activePower
enumValues.description: Active power control at AC side.

contents.name: ratedIdc
contents.description: Rated converter DC current, also called IdN. Converter configuration data used in power flow.

contents.name: targetAlpha
contents.description: Target firing angle. CSC control variable used in power flow.

contents.name: targetGamma
contents.description: Target extinction angle. CSC  control variable used in power flow.

contents.name: targetIdc
contents.description: DC current target value. CSC control variable used in power flow.
